Package org.jerkar.api.java

Contains classes providing fluent API for dealing with java tools, classpaths and classloaders.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JkClassLoader Wrapper around URLClassLoader offering convenient methods and fluent interface to deal with URLClassLoader.
JkClasspath A sequence of file to be used as a class path.
JkJavaCompiler Stand for a compilation setting and process.
JkJavadocMaker Offers fluent interface for producing Javadoc.
JkJavaProcess Offer fluent interface for launching Java processes.
JkManifest Helper class to read and write Manifest from and to file.
JkResourceProcessor This processor basically copies some resource files to a target folder (generally the class folder).
JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator Defines values to be interpolated (replacing ${key} by their value), and the file filter to apply it.
 

Package org.jerkar.api.java Description

Contains classes providing fluent API for dealing with java tools, classpaths and classloaders.
